sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Text, View, StyleSheet, TouchableOpacity } from "react-native";
import { Button } from "react-native-web";
import './alarm.css';

const Alarm = () => {
  return (
      <View style={styles.wrapper}>
        <Text style={{color:'red'}}>Alarm</Text>
        <Text>4:20:30</Text>
        <View style={styles.content}>
            <View style={styles.column}>
                <select style={{outline:'none',border:'none',height:'53px',width:'100%',fontSize:'19px'}}>
                    <option value="Hour" selected hidden>Hour</option>
                    <option value="01">01</option>
                    <option value="02">02</option>
                    <option value="03">03</option>
                </select>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.column}>
            <View style={styles.Minute}>
            <select style={{outline:'none',border:'none',height:'53px',width:'100%',fontSize:'19px'}}>
                    <option value="Minute" selected hidden>Minute</option>
                    <option value="01">01</option>
                    <option value="02">02</option>
                    <option value="03">03</option>
                </select>
            </View>
            </View>
            <View style={styles.column}>
            <View style={styles.Second}>
            <select style={{outline:'none',border:'none',height:'53px',width:'100%',fontSize:'19px'}}>
                    <option value="AM/PM" selected hidden>AM/PM</option>
                    <option value="AM">AM</option>
                    <option value="PM">PM</option>
                </select>
            </View>
            </View>
        </View>
        <TouchableOpacity style={styles.button}>Set Alarm</TouchableOpacity>
      </View>
  );
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    wrapper:{
        color:'flex',
        alignItems:'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        width:'440px',
        backgroundColor:'red',
        borderRadius:'10px',
        padding:'30px 30px 38px',
        flexDirection:'column',
    },
    column:{
        borderRadius:'5px',
        padding:'0 10px',
        border:'1px solid #999',
        width:'calc(100%/3 -5px)',

    },
    button:{
        width:'100%',
        margin
    }

})
export default Alarm;
